content: In addition, as Alan noted, we executed on our first property disposition earlier this week, selling a Pennsylvania property that we originally acquired in 2019 and leased to Maitri, a private single state operator for $23.5 million or approximately $461 per square foot, which is of course the price per square foot well above our operating portfolio average of $272 per square foot and above what we originally paid for the property including funded improvements.
